title: Riot Ban This Guy Please
body: Okay so, I just got out of a game of draft and the [champ] was being normally OCE standard toxic by saying "ez" after killing peeps. But when [champ] called him bad I said, "Go Back To KinderGarten [champ]" in which he responded "Go Back To Preschool" which was fine until he said "Go Back To Jail You N^gger with an er not an a(The Slave Term). I found this offensive since I have African-American roots so I said "reported" in which he responded "Go Ahead" it was pretty normal until the end with [champ] flaming and me and [champ] responding and all. But in the match results after we lost it was bad, I don't know how to post the logs of that but I said "report [champ] for racism" and he said "Go Ahead N^gger" and after said "jew get gassed" before firing a bunch of racial slurs at me and the part that made me feel sick was the fact his team backed him up by saying "Jax is just a sore loser" and all that. If This player could be permanently banned or at least suspended it would make me feel better. [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] is a racist and the reason OCE is known as the 2nd most toxic region for LoL.

replies.body:
I mean there are certain things that are picked up and people banned. Saying KYS or being overtly racist are some of those things.

I wouldn't be surprised if he is already banned. You can keep an eye on his OP.GG but he's probably gone.

I like to "favourite" people I report on OPGG when they are really toxic to see if they get banned. More often than not within a few days they are banned.

1. No naming and shaming!

2. Riot doesn't care enough to deal with people like this... more people = more money.
